name: AutoLayoutDSL
summary: A straightforward DSL for specifying Cocoa Auto Layout constraints.
description:
AutoLayoutDSL allows you to turn this:
                    
                        [self.view addConstraint:[NSLayoutConstraint constraintWithItem:_button2
                                                                              attribute:NSLayoutAttributeLeft
                                                                              relatedBy:NSLayoutRelationEqual
                                                                                 toItem:_button1
                                                                              attribute:NSLayoutAttributeRight
                                                                             multiplier:1.0
                                                                               constant:5.0]];
                    
                    into this:
                    
                        View(_button2).left() == View(_button1).right() + 5.0;

                    .
